question: Many people today are worried about cyber crime such as hacking and identity theft. What problems does cyber crime cause and what solutions can you suggest for ordinary people and business to take?
text: Cybercrimecrim has become a serious problem, nowadays. It is the crime form in which people may lose their lifetime piece. Hence, Numerous issues may come up with this crime and there are certain ways to tackle it which will be discussed below.

Firstly, a financial crisis is a common issue arising as a result of digital corruption. This is because, through digital crime, they may lose the money which they are saving for a long time for their children's better future. This will result in a disturbance in a mental piece.  lastly,  it decreases the online business opportunity for many. An explanation, if this type of crime happens to any common man, they do not trust an online business or any digital service  the next time. this reduces the popularity of the digital world. this will demotivate new entrepreneurs to step back from the digital industry. For an instance, a news reporter from The Times Of India revealed  last week's news that due to increasing in cyber crimes newcomers are  not selecting this online business as their first priority.

However, this problem has certain solutions. First of all, entrepreneurs of the digital world may develop  more encrypted websites or applications which need some specific approval from the user. so that way hackers will have limited access to it . As an outcome,  crime will decline to a certain extent. Secondly,  ordinary people should use some trusted application and should not be too greedy to accept any request from  unknown people through messages or  emails. These major steps would lower the hacking and identity theft in the coming days.

In conclusion, if  ordinary folks take some extra precautions before allowing access to any request then their worries will be reduced. Business owners also should take some steps to build trust among common men to surge their business. But this should be done from both sides Then only  success comes.

error_list.error_des: The word increasing doesn’t seem to fit this context. Consider replacing it with a different one.
